artist: Artist: Todd Norsten; Printer: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; Publisher: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis
creditline: Highpoint Editions Archive, The Friends of Bruce B. Dayton Acquisition Fund and the Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: Screenprint printed in 16 layers: 12 layers of white ink, 2 layers of tan ink, 2 layers of gloss overprint varnish. Edges of print hand-cut and distressed by the artist from a template, including pinholes in upper right and upper left of print.
image_copyright: Copyright © Todd Norsten%2C published by Highpoint Editions
markings: LLC in cream-colored pencil: Archive 1/2 | Publisher\'s stamp in light gray ink, LLC: HP
provenance: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis (publisher); sold to MIA, 2020.
signed: BC in cream-colored pencil: Todd Norsten 2009
title: Endless, Ceaseless, Boundless Joy
